wikipedia_page.main: Sir James Caleb Anderson, 1st Baronet (21 July 1792 – 4 April 1861), was an inventor.

response: He also took an interest in a patent of Sir James Anderson, 1st Baronet, and a William Fenton, Part 7 of Patent 11273.), relating to the use of gun cotton (xyloidine) in a type of internal combustion engine.
